projects.title: Lybrate.com - Clone
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by mentors. The project deals with developing an e-commerce website for health care products. An online store where customers can select products of interest. The selected items collected in a shopping cart. For checkout, customer will be asked to fill address and payment information. Email is sent to the customer for OTP verification and for successful payment/order placed.

projects.title: Nykaa.com-clone
projects.description: The clone is built using the MERN stack; named so since the four key technologies that make up the stack are MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.Using Redux for global state management, making API calls to the server side, and passing components states as props where required was a little hard to keep up with during the sprint. It was challenging to build the clone having learnt the concepts only weeks ago. The successful implementation gave us the confidence we needed in ourselves and React is now another feather in our caps.

projects.title: Amazon landing page
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. The objective is cloning amazon.in  landing page and improving skills. Working alone was pretty challenging and I made it complete. Main features are slideshow, hovering effect, dropdown on hover etc.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: Todo list app build on react using material ui and json server crud, here backend api is hosted on heroku and frontend is hosted on netlify, In this mini project you will see an amazing design with pagination and animation on delete.

projects.title: Stop Watch & Timer
projects.description: Stopwatch and Timer - Presented here new, free app which will help you to measure the time of any situation!. This was also my first project in React library. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: Are you a movie lover?  I used a movies API to show top rated movies with their posters, ratings , released date and other details. Users can use the search bar to look up specific movie titles.

projects.title: Quotes Generator
projects.description: This is a very small project created with the purpose of learning the fundamentals of React.js starting from a simple Create React App.

projects.title: coschedule.com-clone
projects.description: This is the first time for us to work on a project remotely with a team.We faced some challenges during completion of this project. But after crossing each and every huddle we have finally completed the cloning of the CoSchedule website with our basic knowledge of html, css and js.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A mini/solo project in which that detect weather of giving location using weather api, in this i user component based js, sweet-alert library and css animation
